Reviews.Title: Fabulous
Reviews.Author: Alissa J. Hebermehl "Addicted to the Kindle"
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with the football tv.  My son loves it in his sports themed room.  The picture is very clear.

Reviews.Title: I don't have the football... BUT
Reviews.Author: Jarrod
Reviews.Content: I do not have the football version of this monitor. However I'm considering it. I have been using I-Inc (hanspree) H283 Monitors for several years and I cannot suggest them enough. They are priced cheaper than the competition by a considerable amount. The picture quality is amazing and runs at 1920x1200 resolution. For some crazy reason they have discontinued the 28" monitor that I have come to love and am considering buying a football TV to use as my monitor assuming it's the same thing. I don't watch football but what else can I do? maybe they have a baseball or basketball version?

Reviews.Title: Football TV
Reviews.Author: Clare
Reviews.Content: The tv looked great,felt and looked like a real football,nobody has it,around here.Nice item.Will tell others about this item. Showed it to friends.

Reviews.Title: Will not purchase this brand again
Reviews.Author: Dozier
Reviews.Content: I got my son this football tv less than a year ago and it has already played out. I gave it a 2 because when it did work the picture and show was great for the price. When i began having problem with the tv they asked me to send it in for repairs and it cost me more to ship in than I paid for the actual tv. I called to inform them and they told me i was out of luck because they send out no services instruction so no one but their tech support could service the tv. I will not purchase anything else from this company it was a waste of money because we only had the tv less than a year!

Reviews.Title: Will buy more as we grow our business.
Reviews.Author: Harold Thompson
Reviews.Content: We are using 7 Hannspree TV's in our business .The best units we have every used with no trouble. We love the style and 1080p.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!!!!!!!!!��
Reviews.Author: shawnee
Reviews.Content: Omg!!!! I love this TV and my 4 year old son LOVES IT TOO. I bought it for his Big Boy Room this past Christmas. He gets so many complaints about it, when his Dad actually saw it in person he said he wanted one too lol.

Reviews.Title: football tv
Reviews.Author: jrob
Reviews.Content: i bought this TV for my husband's man cave. He just loves it, we also have the apple one by hannspree in the kitchen, nice picture and sound, very much a talk piece.

Reviews.Title: I love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Carmelle
Reviews.Content: I love this tv are should I say my son loves it. Nice size prefect for him, he we'll grow into it

Reviews.Title: I am very pleased with this tv!
Reviews.Author: LAKIVA ROBINSON
Reviews.Content: This was an awesome gift for my son's 6yr old birthday last year. It completed the sports theme in his room. People are still fascinated when they see it.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Katy
Reviews.Content: Son loves his tv and I fits right in with his football room! It feels like a real football. :)

Reviews.Title: The kids love it!
Reviews.Author: Rachel Harris Maxwell
Reviews.Content: This is the coolest kid tv ever. It's one of a kind. The picture is ok, I've seen better but for the price and for the little one you can't beat it.

Reviews.Title: Two good to punt.
Reviews.Author: E. Strawn
Reviews.Content: I have the 25 inch Hannspree which I left elsewhere 2,000 miles away and decided I could use a larger one as I have a morespacious place to use it. I was surprised that the 28 inch has several more connections than the 25; USB for example and the sound seems better even without as yet hooking up my old powered speakers.

Reviews.Title: LOVE LOVE this TV!!
Reviews.Author: Sharon
Reviews.Content: We just purchased this tv for Christmas for my grandson and I cant believe how awesome it is!! Not only is the texture on the tv feel like a real football it looks like one too EXACTLY!! I love the fact that it is boyish and fun looking besides that the picture is completely clear and beautiful! Everybody wants to be in my grandsons room now to watch tv on is football tv!! The best thing also is we ordered on Dec 9th and it arrived on the 12th! How fast is that!! That was a big plus! I am glad we ordered this because we got a GREAT deal! It was on sale at the time so we only paid 199!! Best price I found anywhere!! The tv stand that you connect to the tv for the base is SO sturdy, That also made me feel a lot better that it wasn't some plastic base and I don't have to worry about it falling over! It is so strong and made of metal and it has 3 options for the tv view, It lays all the way back middle or upright!! I would totally recommend this tv for anyone! You can't go wrong and you wont regret it!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for sports themed bedroom!
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Clark Paine
Reviews.Content: Got this for my Grandson for Christmas. He has a football themed bedroom, so this is a perfect TV.  We opened it to be sure it worked and to see the quality. From what we have seen so far we are very happy and cannot wait until Christmas and see the look on my little man's face.  What a great idea.....hoping everything goes as well as we anticipate.  It really looks great and the picture was very clear!

Reviews.Title: Why I Rate T.V. a 4 star
Reviews.Author: vaun olhausen
Reviews.Content: Because the T.V. works! The previous T.V. from the same company, but not the same model, was a joke and I had to eat the costs. Hannspree wanted me to ship and package former T.V. at my cost back to them for repair and we only had the T.V. for less then a year. I am only rating the current T.V. and transaction.

Reviews.Title: Love it, but slight problems
Reviews.Author: iris
Reviews.Content: I would have gave this product 5 stars but the volume is not that loud, unless you turn the volume all the way up. And the picture doesn't go full screen, which is a slight problem. But overall, my younger brothers love this T.V. They had the basketball T.V. before but it broke, so we decided to change it up with this football t.v. And they really like this t.v. Perfect for a boy's room!

Reviews.Title: Very cool TV!
Reviews.Author: HEIDI BARCH
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for my boys as a X-mas present. Had to give it to them early(Oct) because the box for it was huge and had no place to hide it!!!. Needless to say that my boys love it and it is a conversation piece.It has a clear picture and so far works very well. The 28 inch is the perfect size. Not too big and not too small. Very happy with the purchase!

Reviews.Title: Everything I expected
Reviews.Author: BGreen
Reviews.Content: Great conversation piece all my company likes my tv and want one for themselves.  Nice size for the area it was put in.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME TV
Reviews.Author: Walter Celestain
Reviews.Content: THE TV IS AWESOME, BIGGER THAN EXPECTED.  I WOULD RECOMMEND THIS TV TO ALL FOOTBALL JUNKIES AROUND!  LOOKS PERFECT IN MY MAN CAVE AND FRIENDS LOVE IT, KEEP ASKING WHERE DID I PURCHASE IT!

Reviews.Title: Love, love, love it!
Reviews.Author: Professional Shopper
Reviews.Content: So pleased with this purchase. I originally saw the Basketball Tv first. Decided to go with the football as soon as I saw it. Great quality, perfect picture and is an even greater compliment to my boys sports themed room! Highly suggest!

Reviews.Title: Hannspree Football TV
Reviews.Author: Janice
Reviews.Content: My 10 year old son got a Hannspree Football TV for his birthday and he absolutely loves it!  We weren't sure if we wanted to buy it because we had not heard of it before.  It is a great TV; the picture is great and the buttons on the front and the hook ups in the back are nice.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Mscook
Reviews.Content: Bought it for my 11 year old son and he love it!! My husband hangs out in his room now.

Reviews.Title: Football tv
Reviews.Author: Toney
Reviews.Content: I am the talk of the tvs. Nobody has ever seen a Football tv until they came to my house. Great picture,real football leather what a great product
